Others: Paul George suffered a hyperextended left knee during the Philadelphia 76ers vs Atlanta Hawks preseason game.
George played 12 minutes, scoring 8 points and 2 rebounds before exiting the game.
The Sixers announced that George would not be taking the floor for the rest of the game.
There is no official word on George's status for the rest of their preseason games.
George will likely be rested for the 76ers' upcoming preseason bouts against the Brooklyn Nets and Orlando Magic.
The injury will dent coach Nick Nurse's plans as he will probably field a starting lineup without George for the rest of the practice games.
